job_description:
Description

Are you the type of developer who likes a broad scope of responsibility, including design, implementation and ongoing support. In this small technology company, you’ll play the role of lead architect and developer for a well-established software application.

You will be coding primarily in Java, and also getting involved with some front-end work using JavaScript.

This role is well suited to an experienced software developer who has been developing business software applications for several years. Experience with financial management software would be considered an asset.

This is a full-time position, and includes a competitive base salary, paid vacation and extended health and dental benefits.

In this role, you’ll work primarily on-site in the Vancouver office, based near Granville and Broadway.

One of the attractive parts of this job is to get involved in all aspects of the software development lifecycle for this successful application. On some days you’ll be working on systems design for a new feature, and on other days you’ll be implementing your solution in code.

[ HOW TO APPLY / INTERVIEW PROCESS ]

A bit about myself - my name is Nathan Wawruck, and I am a recruitment consultant based in Vancouver, BC. I have over a decade of matching software and IT and marketing professionals to job opportunities, and I am always looking to connect with like-minded people in the Vancouver area.

If you're interested in pursuing this role, please apply to this posting online, and contact me for an initial discussion. This is a chance for us to discuss specifics, such as the company name, the key hiring managers, and the more in-depth job requirements. This is also a great opportunity to talk about your overall career goals and preferences. We can even discuss other potential roles which may fit what you're looking for. Please find me on LinkedIn by searching my name: Nathan Wawruck

Requirements

Here are some of the items that you'll bring to the table for this role:

[-] You are an experienced Java developer with 10 or more years of hands-on java coding experience

[-] You are comfortable designing systems using n-tier architecture

[-] You are comfortable supporting your applications
